trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute" /> marks a component's visibility.
If <see cref="F:System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Yes" /> is present, a visual designer can show this component on a designer.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute> is a hint to the Designer.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute> è un hint per la finestra di progettazione.

trans-unit.source: The Designer will ignore this attribute for components that have a UI presence.
trans-unit.target: Questo attributo per i componenti che hanno una presenza dell'interfaccia utente verrà ignorato.

trans-unit.source: It can only be applied to classes.
trans-unit.target: Può essere applicato solo alle classi.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute> is most useful when you have a control that accepts child components.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute> è particolarmente utile quando si dispone di un controllo che supporti i componenti figlio.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView?displayProperty=nameWithType> control's node items should not appear in the component tray because they are drawn by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView?displayProperty=nameWithType> control.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView?displayProperty=nameWithType> elementi nodo del controllo non devono essere visualizzati nella barra dei componenti in quanto vengono disegnati dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TreeView?displayProperty=nameWithType> controllo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute" /> class.
Creates a new <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute" /> set to the default value of <see langword="false" />.
The value that the <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible" /> property will be set against.

Creates a new <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute" /> with the <see cref="P:System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Visible" /> property set to the given value in <paramref name="visible" />.
The default visibility which is <see langword="Yes" />.
An Object to compare with this instance or a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
Returns a value that indicates whether this instance is equal to a specified object.
<see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="obj" /> equals the type and value of this instance; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
Returns the hash code for this instance.
A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
Gets a value indicating if this instance is equal to the <see cref="F:System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Default" /> value.
<see langword="true" />, if this instance is equal to the <see cref="F:System.ComponentModel.DesignTimeVisibleAttribute.Default" /> value; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
Marks a component as not visible in a visual designer.
Gets or sets whether the component should be shown at design time.
<see langword="true" /> if this component should be shown at design time, or <see langword="false" /> if it shouldn't.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se il componente deve essere visualizzato in fase di progettazione o <see langword="false" /> se non consentito.

trans-unit.source: Marks a component as visible in a visual designer.
